channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SC

item.title: Report E-2024010334
item.description:
Report E-2024010334

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-19T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-21
  • City: NORTH AUGUSTA
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: It was reported that approximately .5 cups of Formic acid (Kleen MCT115) released from a 5 gallon jug due to a forklift loading incident. The release only impacted the pail and the pallet. The SDS was reviewed with the terminal and advised terminal personnel to clean it up based on the sds. (1) 30 gallon DF contains oil dry, and one jug of product was created as waste and left for the terminal to manage.

item.title: Report X-2024010190
item.description:
Report X-2024010190

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-18T15:13:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-19
  • City: FORT MILL
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND ON THE VAN LINE WITH A STRONG SMELLING AROMA COMING FROM IT. THE ADMIN ON THE BELT TOOK IT OFF OF THE VAN SCAN TO INVESTIGATE. SHE FOUND THAT THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING AND TO HER SURPRISE WAS A HAZMAT ON THE INSIDE OF THE OUTER BOX. THE OUTER BOX HAD NO MARKINGS OR HAZMAT LABELS, BUT THE INSIDE BOX HAD A FLAMMABLE LIQUID DIAMOND LABEL AND A UN NUMBER ON IT. SHE PLACED IT IN A HAZMAT TOTE TO BE INVESTIGATED FURTHER. DescribePack: THE PACKAGE FAILURE WAS IN THE CLOSURE. ONE OF THE GALLONS LEAKED OUT THE PRODUCT INSIDE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A HAZMAT TOTE AND CLOSED SO THAT THE AROMA/ VAPORS WERE NO LONGER IN THE AIR.
